titleStmt.title: A vulgar or popvlar discourse. Shewing that the warre [raised by the two] houses, fomented chiefly [by the Londo]ners ... and others ... disaffected to monarchicall government is not ... in defence of the ... Protestant religion ... the laws and liberties of the kingdom ... but rather destructive to them all. / Written dialogue-wise, by Irenaeus ... against Eristes ...
titleStmt.author: Alvey, Yeldard.

notesStmt.note: "The epistle dedicatory" signed: Y.A. [i.e. Yeldard Alvey].
Imperfect: t.p. heavily stained, with loss of print; text is faded.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
